text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActInvoiceDetailDrugProductCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActInvoiceDetailClinicalProductCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActInvoiceDetailGenericCode
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode

name: XActInvoiceDetailPharmacyCode
title: x_ActInvoiceDetailPharmacyCode
description: The billable codes selected for use for Pharmacy Invoices. Steward is Financial Management.
